## Binary Classifier Data CSV

After running nearest neighbor for each k value (3,5,10,15,20,25) I received the following accuracy results from the binary.csv:
1. knn3 - 97.6%
2. knn5 - 97.8%
3. knn10 - 97.8%
4. knn15 - 97.2%
5. knn20 - 97.4%
6. knn25 - 97.4%
